title: What’s Hatnin’
lyrics:
On “What’s Hatnin',” Justin and Future focuses on conflict resolution and forgiveness to their partner.

The title, “What Hatnin'” is southern slang for “what happening.”
[Produced by Soundz]
[Intro: Future]

Hatnin', what's hatnin'
JB, Future, yeah
